<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hireling Manager](/Feats.aspx?ID=2130) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 206 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Charisma 14

</column>

---

You are able to find and secure better labor than most. When securing a [hireling](/Equipment.aspx?ID=67) for a service, that hireling gains a +2 circumstance bonus to all skill checks. This circumstance bonus applies to both trained and untrained hirelings and has no effect on the cost of the service or labor provided.
name: Hireling Manager
